DOC.criteria: 1 . Written informed consent patient legal representative ( accord country specific regulation ) 2 . Male female patient , age ≥ 18 year 3 . Body weight 50 kg 120 kg 4 . BioADM concentration > 70 pg/ml 5 . Patient early septic shock ( start vasopressor therapy < 12 hour ) 1 . Moribund death consider imminent < 28 day 2 . Preexisting unstable condition ( e.g . recent cerebral hemorrhage infarct , recent acute unstable myocardial infarction ( < 3 month ) , congestive heart failure New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) Class IV 3 . Patients require cardiopulmonary resuscitation last 4 week prior evaluation enrollment 4 . Severe Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) chronic oxygen need home ( GOLD IV ) 5 . Any organ bone marrow transplant within past 24 week 6 . Uncontrolled serious hemorrhage ( ≥ 2 unit blood / platelet previous 24 hrs. ) . Patients may consider enrollment bleed stop patient otherwise qualified 7 . Uncontrolled hematological / oncological malignancy 8 . Immunosuppressed patient ( know HIV , absolute neutropenia < 500 per µL ) 9 . Treatment immunosuppressive drug 10 . Severe chronic liver disease ( ChildPugh C ) 11 . Systemic fungal infection active tuberculosis 12 . Neuromuscular disorder impact breathe / spontaneous ventilation 13 . Burns > 30 % body surface 14 . Plasmapheresis 15 . Women pregnant nursing 16 .
